arts.ttl: Transfer rumors, news: Spurs plot move for PSG's Kolo Muani
arts.sum: Spurs are reportedly keen to bolster their attack with PSG forward Randal Kolo Muani. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

arts.ttl: Tottenham Leave £50M-Rated PSG Talent with Final Transfer Decision to Make
arts.sum: With the January transfer window now open, Randal Kolo Muani’s future at Paris Saint-Germain appears uncertain. The 26-year-old forward has struggled to make a significant impact this season, raising questions about his role in Luis Enrique’s plans. Muani has logged just 453 minutes across all competitions, failing to cement a regular starting position. Whether he’s operating as an attacking midfielder, supporting striker, or leading the charge as a center-forward, the Brazilian has adapted effortlessly to the demands of the English side. arts.ttl: Dembélé scores last-gasp winner as PSG wins Champions Trophy
arts.sum: Ousmane Dembélé scored a stoppage-time winner as Paris Saint-Germain beat Monaco 1-0 to win the Champions Trophy on Sunday. Although Köhn made a fine save to deny Achraf Hakimi in the 74th minute, he failed to properly read Ruiz’s cross and Monaco missed out on winning the trophy for the first time since 2000.

arts.ttl: Video: Ousmane Dembélé Scores in Dying Moments for Dramatic TdC Win
arts.sum: The 2024 Trophée des Champions was scoreless for the majority of the contest. However, in the second half stoppage time, Ousmane Dembélé broke the hearts of AS Monaco to snatch a trophy for Paris Saint-Germain.
